welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Brunete, a charming and vibrant city known for its beautiful architecture, lively atmosphere, and rich cultural heritage! We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay. We hope you have a wonderful time here!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barajas Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second terminal at Barajas Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Barajas Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
